meanings.definition: Placing too much emphasis on trivial or minor details.
meanings.sent1: She is so persnickety about the color of her pens.
meanings.sent2: The persnickety cat only ate a specific brand of food.
meanings.sent3: The persnickety squirrel insisted on arranging its acorns by size.
meanings.sent4: Her persnickety nature was like a magnifying glass on the smallest flaws.
meanings.sent5: The persnickety teacher noticed every tiny mistake in the students' work.

meanings.sent1: He was persnickety about the way his socks were folded.
meanings.sent2: The persnickety eater refused to try any new foods.
meanings.sent3: The persnickety toddler would only wear one specific pair of shoes.
meanings.sent4: Her persnickety taste in music made her a tough DJ to please.
meanings.sent5: The persnickety customer returned the shirt because of a tiny loose thread.

meanings.sent1: The persnickety artist spent hours perfecting each brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The persnickety accountant double-checked every number on the spreadsheet.
meanings.sent3: The persnickety detective noticed a small clue that others had missed.
meanings.sent4: His persnickety approach to gardening resulted in a perfectly manicured lawn.
meanings.sent5: The persnickety architect designed a house with meticulous precision.
